sentences.en: Acid production of lactic acid bacteria is sufficient to coagulate milk proteins.
sentences.cn: 乳酸细菌产生的酸足以使乳蛋白质凝固.

sentences.en: An agent that causes a liquid or sol to coagulate.
sentences.cn: 胃液中的一种酶,能使乳类凝结.

sentences.en: As the blood ceases to coagulate creating disease, then accidents through transportation will also fade.
sentences.cn: 当血液停止凝结来产生疾病时, 那么通过运输所产生的事故也将隐退.

sentences.en: As the egg whites cook, they coagulate and rise to the surface.
sentences.cn: 蛋白一煮就会凝结，并且浮起来。

sentences.en: Before and after treatment, lipid metabolism, liver, kidney and blood coagulate functions of patients were tested.
sentences.cn: 于ILIB治疗前后检查患者的脂类代谢 、 肝 、 肾功能和凝血功能.

sentences.en: Blood began to coagulate around the edges of the wound.
sentences.cn: 血液开始在伤口的边缘凝固。

sentences.en: Build up the partnership between teaching and administration in order to coagulate the group strength.
sentences.cn: 建立伙伴关系,教学与行政互相支援,凝聚团队力量.

sentences.en: In extreme polarity, dreams coagulate into thought - form that is resonant.
sentences.cn: 在极端极性中, 梦想凝结成共振的思想形态.

sentences.en: Most polymer emulsion may coagulate when they enter waste streams.
sentences.cn: 多数聚合物乳浊液在进入废水流时可能凝聚.

sentences.en: Papain and chymopapain can coagulate soybean protein isolate ( SPI ) , both of them are cysteine proteinases.
sentences.cn: 木瓜凝乳酶和木瓜蛋白酶具有促进大豆蛋白形成凝乳的作用, 同时它们也是巯基蛋白酶.

sentences.en: Pasty - liquid has the advantage of high transmittance, the low coagulate - rate, the small reduce function.
sentences.cn: 它具有糊 状 液透明度高 、 凝结速度较低 、 退减作用小等优点.

sentences.en: Since small amounts of barium sulfate do not readily coagulate the precipitate can easily go unnoticed.
sentences.cn: 少量的硫酸钡沉淀凝聚缓慢,往往被忽略.

sentences.en: Testing result showed that the coagulate particle content of PET with additive decreased markedly.
sentences.cn: 测试结果表明,引入添加物后所得PET样品的凝聚粒子显著减少.

sentences.en: The denatured proteins coagulate, stiffening the foam and stabilizing the air bubbles.
sentences.cn: 变性后的蛋白质会凝结, 使泡沫变硬,使气泡更稳定.

sentences.en: The three kinds of labor in value creation are live labor, transition labor and coagulate labor.
sentences.cn: 商品价值创造中的三种劳动是耗费劳动 、 传导劳动和凝结劳动.

words.tran_cn: [建][化工] 促凝剂；凝血剂；凝结剂
[助剂] 凝结剂；[化工] 凝结器

trans.tran_en: if a liquid coagulates, or something coagulates it, it becomes thick and almost solid
